about_the_game:
The Most Creative Racing Game!

Create your own vehicles, characters and tracks by combining simple shapes together without any restrictions!

For example:

- You can craft characters with several heads, any number of eyes, arms, legs, and maybe 1 or several tails!

- Your vehicles can be any objects, as long as you put some wheels!

- Your tracks can look like anything, as long as there are at least 2 checkpoints! A laptop, a bedroom, a beach, a starship, a car, a horse...

- Your checkpoints and direction signs can also look like anything you want! Trees, objects, characters, ...

Imagine any models, build them and use them in your races!

Ready to race? Go!

  • Perform stunts, push, and rush to the finish line as fast as you can!

  • Win tracks and models. Race as much as you want with endless fun!

  • Race solo or up to 4 players in local split-screen multiplayer!

Craft your racing tracks

  • Edit existing tracks or create new ones from scratch in any theme (cars, beach, bedroom, workshop, etc.)

  • Add jumps, decorations, and obstacles.

  • Use funny models as checkpoints and direction signs.

Create your characters and opponents

  • Customize any character or create your own. Bring any idea you can imagine to life, like a creature with a robot body and two animal heads. You choose!

Build new Vehicles

  • Choose from classic options like karts, buggies, racing cars, and trucks.

  • Or go for funnier ones like a bath vehicle, a sofa car, or a tiger rover. Anything is possible!

  • Click the Wishlist button now!

Try the Demo!

  • Try the demo and let me know your ideas!
